sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CatalogTransactionPopupCategory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Invoked when you mouse over a category on the homepage</description>
        <name>CatalogTransactionPopupCategory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include('PrototypeServer');
gs.include('AbstractTransaction');

var CatalogTransactionPopupCategory = Class.create();

CatalogTransactionPopupCategory.prototype =  Object.extendsObject(AbstractTransaction, {

   execute : function() {
       var sys_id = g_request.getParameter("sysparm_sys_id");
       var p = new GlideappCategoryPopper();	
       var s = p.renderPopup(this.processor.getController(), sys_id);
       this.processor.writeOutput(s);
   }
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-09-24 09:40:42</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>93bb60a7c0a8002700e756f19757d1dd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CatalogTransactionPopupCategory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_93bb60a7c0a8002700e756f19757d1dd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>glide.maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2008-09-24 09:55:57</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>475</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
